website_summaries.verdict: The only tricycle stroller on our list that folds down for storage and travel. Ideal for family vacations or road trips.
pros: Folds down small enough to pass as an infant carry-on
Fits in most car trunks with room to spare
Suitable for babies as young as nine months
Footrest keeps little feet comfortable until they're able to reach the pedals
High-back seat and padded safety bar for added security
cons: Only accommodates toddlers up to 36 months
Some users complained that the push handle needed constant readjustment

customer_reviews.title: Had to watch YouTube videos to figure out how to switch from child to parent control and whenever I take her out in it the handle keeps pushing itself down(yes I have to locks on to keep it in place) Assembling and disassembling is not as easy as they make it appear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! My only issues were the steering and the push handle. Had to watch YouTube videos to figure out how to switch from child to parent control and whenever I take her out in it the handle keeps pushing itself down(yes I have to locks on to keep it in place) Assembling and disassembling is not as easy as they make it appear. It's really hard to get it folded down and back in the bag it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Kimhan Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Good trike, just no guard for childs feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this trike handles, nice space in the back for storage. I don't understand why there are so many complaints about the folding or put together, I find it relatively easy. The down fall for me is there should be a round attachment for the pegs so the child can not put there feet on the ground. I get scared when my 18 month old puts his feet on the ground and I see them bend.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: ... bike for my 16 month old and we absolutely love it! There was barely any assembly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bike for my 16 month old and we absolutely love it! There was barely any assembly, it came folded in a bag and all I had to do was click on wheels! My son loves to sit in it and also loves that he is able to push it because the handlebar is adjustable and he can reach it if it’s on the lowest level. We are so happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for something practical, convenient and durable.
customer_reviews.author: HBO

customer_reviews.title: The best smart bike out there for a 1/2 year olds!!
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️ this tricycle. We are a very active family and are always on the go. I use this daily and it makes me love it more and more each day. (I’ve used this on grass while hiking and also have used it instead of a stroller while shopping) It’s easy to fold, easy to push, and I think it looks much nicer than the other smarttrikes out there. My 1 year old loves this. He even sleeps comfortable in it while we hike about. I honestly can’t say enough about this tricycle!! Don’t hesitate on buying this! You won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa edri

customer_reviews.title: Adult handle creates backpain
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bike for my kid for two months now and I can officially say that it's not value for money. My kid is 14 months and I need to control the bike using handle. However handle keeps going down no matter how little weight I put on it. It takes mere seconds before it goes down and I have start to experience back pain because of it staying so low. Other minor fault is with shadow cover as it hardly provides any shadow for the kid. Bike also seems very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Could be better :/
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and was as described. My complaints are that for the price you pay this should be much more durable. The handle bar for the parents kept sliding down even without putting much pressure so I had to constantly slide it up. I’m not sure if this is a design flaw as I saw other people had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle bucarelo

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Ridiculously easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old and I love this trike. I’ve purchased a similar style trike for my mother in laws house and assembly was really annoying. This one comes in a little pouch 99% assembled. You just need to open it up and pop in three wheels. The straps easily slip over my sons head which I really like. Smooth ride and really cute blue and black color.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sandner

customer_reviews.title: Compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We got our smartrike a couple weeks ago and love it! It is easy to assemble and fun for my 1.5 year old to sit in. It came timely and exactly as described. Looking forward to taking it with us on future outings!
customer_reviews.author: 3xter

customer_reviews.title: The trike is easy to fold and control
customer_reviews.text: It arrived just in time before my boy‘s birthday, much ealier than I expectee. The trike is easy to fold and control. My boy likes the bike, the storage bag is at his level and he learns to put his backpack into the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Baby Trike
customer_reviews.text: This Smartrike truly is the ultimate baby tricycle. I got it for my nieces and it’s so cool! I My sister in-law is constantly getting new things as the girls get older so I love that this grows with them making it useful for YEARS to come. It’s made well and in my option quite affordable so I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Spencer Hammel

customer_reviews.title: ... to say that it is exactly what we got recommended for. The folding and the opening is very ...
customer_reviews.text: We just bought our first Smartrike four our little baby and we have to say that it is exactly what we got recommended for. The folding and the opening is very simple to handle. It has nice smart features that I haven't seen on other similar products. The driving is easy and most importantly we feel that our baby is very secured.
customer_reviews.author: Inbar Moshkovitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice an easy to use. It is adjustable to kids a various ages. It’s fold very easy wicket for us is the best thing since we keep it in the car. THE colors are beautiful and the kids loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hadar

customer_reviews.title: We love our SmarTrike 500
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smarTrike 500 for my 18 month old and she loves it. It’s a nice change from her stroller. She seems really comfortable in it and she uses the pedals pretty freely. The steering is great too. It’s super easy to push her around and take her out. The best part is that it is easy to fold and put in my car. I love this thing!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Shvets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality trike!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this trike! We took it out of the box and it came almost fully assembled. Could not have been easier. We took it right outside and our daughter loves it. Great quality bike and perfect for our family walks!
customer_reviews.author: E Bauman

customer_reviews.title: An amazing baby to toddler tricycle
customer_reviews.text: This smart trike tricycle has the best value for money, both my baby and my 2.5 years boy can enjoy them. They are colorful, stable and easy to run - my toddler who never used a tricycle fell in love with them immediately.They have a parent handle with adjustable height and a small storage in the back to take all that is needed for an afternoon walk. I use it often instead of a stroller, and when we get home they fold and practically don't take up any space. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elad Yana

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! I got it as a tricycle for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I got it as a tricycle for a 1 year old. It rides smoothly, the folding is very easy and it feels very safe. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I thought it was just a unique baby trike/ toddler tricycle for my son but when I got it I realized it was so much more. Great storage areas, beverage holder, easy to fold and put in the car. My son loves it and couldn’t be happier. I definitely recommend smartrike to any parent. Extremely safe and comfortable for the child.
customer_reviews.author: david g.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Luv it, except its a little chore to fold down and to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Push handle keeps slipping down as you walk pushing your child.
customer_reviews.text: Cool bike for my 17 month old but the handle that you push with keeps slipping down as you walk. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart,well built, and very versatile,
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 14 months old daughter. She loves it! This tricycle is well built, and very versatile, so I can use it longer, as my daughter grows older. It looks like she is very comfortable when riding it, and the best part is the folding, when the tricycle folds to a small squarish bag that makes it super easy to carry or put in the car. Super smart and great product. Maayan F.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan F.

customer_reviews.title: the tires are only good enough for smooth and flat surfaces without creating lots ...
customer_reviews.text: The steering is controlled by the child, the push handle doesn’t stay locked, the turning requires one to lift the front wheel, the tires are only good enough for smooth and flat surfaces without creating lots of excess friction. The bag in the back is too small. The seatbelt buckle is 2 step and annoying. The sun visor is small.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love the trike!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller trike!! My daughter is 2 yo and loves this trike. She thinks she’s driving and doesn’t want to get out. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sdw1881

customer_reviews.title: Handlebar slides down when pushing baby
customer_reviews.text: This product is great except the handlebar for parents to push keeps sliding down? My son is 13 months and 25 lbs and I'm constantly having to readjust the handlebars when I push him?
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Iskandarov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it but handle is defective and cannot contact seller
customer_reviews.author: josue perez

customer_reviews.title: Superb toddler trike!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation, my toddler loves the trike! Lights up when he sees we are ready to use it! Very pleased overall, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby love it. It is very easy to assemble. 5 stars. Just perfect to replace the strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke after an hour of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Sams Club two days ago or $89.99 and was able to use it for the first time at Sesame World bear Philly today. I despise it. The front wheel stopped steering in stroller mode after an hour. It’s super difficult to steer. Removing the front wheel and reinstalling does nothing. If my kid turns the handle bars (that are supposed to be disconnected from the front wheel in stroller mode) it turns the wheel with it due to the significant binding/drag on the mechanism. I was able to deal with the cumbersome folding procedure, but after this steering issue I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First Trik
customer_reviews.text: smarTrike was the perfect first tricycle for our one year old. It was easy to assemble and start using right away! Best of all he can sit upright, taking in the entire world around him, while participating in the ride (with the paddles) vs just sitting back in a stroller. When he gets tired, which happens pretty quick, the parent hand rail for pushing comes in handy. We take our trike to the park everyday and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C.

customer_reviews.title: No petals.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. It did not have the petals so the baby can petal and excerise his legs.
customer_reviews.author: t lewis

product_meta.title: smarTrike smarTfold 500 Folding Baby Tricycle, Red
product_meta.description:
Color:Red

 This Folding Trike Grows Along With Your Child! 

 smarTrike proudly presents you with this super 7-in-1 trike, the most practical compact tricycle for babies and toddlers! 

 An ideal baby tricycle for 9-month-old kids, its adjustable design allows it to grow along with them, following these stages: 

 Stage 1: A compact folding toddler tricycle that easily fits into your car. 

 Stage 2: At 9 months, your baby sits using the early stage footrest and enjoys being pushed around in an engaging environment. 

 Stage 3: A cool tricycle for 1 year old babies who are ready to start practicing steering. At 12 months, your baby switches to the fold-down footrest, sitting comfortably and securely on the fully padded, high-back seat with the soft-padded safety bar. 

 Stage 4: At 18 months, remove the canopy as your baby grows. Your baby starts developing confidence, balance and motor skills as the trike slowly transitions from a baby trike to a tricycle for 2 year old explorers. 

 Stage 5: At 24 months, attach the pedals and use the navigator the button on the mudguard so you can easily switch control from parent to child, so your kid can learn to pedal. 

 Stage 6: At 30 months, you can close the telescope parent handle on this smart trike so your kid can begin to pedal independently. 

 Stage 7: From 32 months, you can remove the high back support and let your kid continue their fun-filled rides! 

 Unique Features Of The smarTfold 500 Folding 7 In 1 Trike by smarTrike 

 • Patented Touch Steering System – gives you easy maneuverability. 

 • Mudguard Navigator Button – transfers control from you to your child. 

 • Safe Design – the toddler trike has shock absorbing wheels, padded high back seat, non-slip quick-release pedals and safety bar. 

 • Storage Space – the accessory tray can hold your phone, keys, bottle and other items. 

 • Easy To Open And Store – the folding toddler trike opens and fold easily, and you can store it in its practical carrying bag. 

 Need we say more? Get a smarTfold 500 by smarTrike for your child or any baby in your family today! 

 Click The “Add to Cart” Button NOW!
feature_bullets: smarTrike has designed this innovative 7 in 1 trike that you can fold fully and in one piece no dismantling needed! When folded the “Grow with Me” toddler tricycle is very compact so you can store it with ease or take it with you when you travel

The smartfold 500 is a smart trike that grows with your baby from 9 months old Easily adapt the trike from being a baby tricycle with push handle all the way to being a tricycle for 2 year old kids there’s a setting for every stage of development

This smart trike steers intuitively just touch the parent handle and it moves in the direction you want to go (patented Touch Steering technology) The toddler tricycle also has patented shock-absorbers to ensure a smooth ride for your baby

This smart trike steers intuitively just touch the parent handle and it moves in the direction you want to go (patented Touch Steering technology) The toddler tricycle also has patented shock-absorbers to ensure a smooth ride for your baby

Buy a tricycle for 1 year old birthday present! Surprise someone special with this folding toddler trike and rest assured that both the parents and the child are going to love your gift! Available in a variety of colors you can't go wrong with smarTrike
